system.requirements: Any Career, RT Rank 3+, Fellowship 35+, captured and looted another ship, performed memorably chivalrous act detrimental to their own interest (such as sparing a well-fought foe).

description.value:
A Pirate is anyone willing to take goods without paying for them. To be Successful is to have reliable information networks, planning skills, contacts, and a trustworthy crew. To do all of this with bravado, style, and a dashing smile? That's a Swashbuckler.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Swashbuckler Automatically Gain Enemy (Imperial Navy) Talent Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Combat Flair

system.effect:
